text:
@SenKamalaHarris @maddow 
One coronavirus death recorded in the USA every 44 seconds in April. Is this an  ineffectual President lacking leadership? Is this guy clueless and narcissistic?
He’s an embarrassment to all Americans, some just might not comprehend it.
trump is FAKE NEWS.
